statements: SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE location='Warehouse A';
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM inventory_tracking WHERE employee_id=1001;
SELECT employee_id, shipping_status FROM inventory_tracking WHERE product_id=5002;
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT employee_id, location FROM inventory_tracking WHERE shipping_status='Shipped';
SELECT employee_id, product_id, quantity, location, shipping_status FROM inventory_tracking WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY shipping_status DESC, employee_id ASC
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE product_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND location = 'Warehouse A'
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory_tracking GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_quantity > 0 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(DISTINCT product_id) AS unique_products FROM inventory_tracking GROUP BY employee_id ORDER BY unique_products DESC, employee_id ASC
SELECT * FROM inventory_tracking WHERE shipping_status = 'Shipped' AND location LIKE '%Room%' ORDER BY product_id ASC
SELECT * FROM employee_inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, location FROM employee_inventory ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT employee_id, product_name, quantity FROM employee_inventory WHERE employee_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM shipping_details WHERE shipping_status = 'shipped';
SELECT order_id, product_name, shipping_status FROM shipping_details ORDER BY order_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC, product_name ASC
SELECT employee_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM employee_inventory GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_quantity > 50

SELECT DISTINCT e.employee_id, e.product_name, s.shipping_status FROM employee_inventory e INNER JOIN shipping_details s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id AND e.product_name = s.product_name WHERE e.location = 'Warehouse' AND s.shipping_status = 'Shipped'
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(DISTINCT product_name) AS unique_products FROM employee_inventory GROUP BY employee_id HAVING unique_products > 1

SELECT e.employee_id, e.product_name, e.quantity, s.shipping_status FROM employee_inventory e LEFT JOIN shipping_details s ON e.employee_id = s.employee_id AND e.product_name = s.product_name WHERE s.shipping_status IS NULL
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT emp_name, emp_dept FROM employees ORDER BY emp_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, item_quantity FROM inventory WHERE item_quantity > 50;
SELECT emp_name, item_name, shipment_date FROM employees JOIN shipments ON employees.emp_id = shipments.emp_id JOIN inventory ON shipments.item_id = inventory.item_id;
SELECT emp_name, emp_email FROM employees WHERE emp_dept = 'Sales';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT emp_name, emp_email FROM employees WHERE emp_dept = 'IT';
SELECT item_name, item_quantity, item_price FROM inventory WHERE item_quantity > 0 ORDER BY item_price DESC;
SELECT emp_name, item_name, shipment_date FROM employees JOIN shipments ON employees.emp_id = shipments.emp_id JOIN inventory ON shipments.item_id = inventory.item_id;
SELECT emp_name, COUNT(shipment_id) AS total_shipments FROM employees JOIN shipments ON employees.emp_id = shipments.emp_id GROUP BY emp_name ORDER BY total_shipments DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory order by quantity desc;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT order_id, shipping_address FROM shipping_details WHERE delivery_status = 'pending';
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM e-commerce_operations WHERE order_date = '2022-09-15';
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY location DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT shipping_address, delivery_status FROM shipping_details WHERE delivery_status = 'Shipped' AND order_id = 1001;
SELECT order_id, product_id, employee_id, quantity, order_date FROM e-commerce_operations WHERE order_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT emp_name, hire_date FROM employee WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT * FROM shipping_details WHERE shipment_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE emp_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT e.emp_name, e.department, o.order_date FROM employee e JOIN orders o ON e.emp_id = o.emp_id WHERE o.product_id = 101 ORDER BY o.order_date DESC;
SELECT s.destination_address, e.emp_name FROM shipping_details s JOIN employee e ON s.emp_id = e.emp_id WHERE s.shipment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT o.order_id, e.emp_name, od.product_id FROM orders o JOIN employee e ON o.emp_id = e.emp_id JOIN e_commerce_operations od ON o.order_id = od.order_id WHERE od.status = 'Shipped';
